translation: There is no one among men who does service dearer to Me, nor shall there be anyone on earth dearer to Me than him.
commentary: 18.69 Not not? f and? Therefore than he? among men among men? Someone any? Me of Me? Priyakrittamah one who does dearer service? will be shall be? Not not? f and? Me of Me? Therefore than he? Another another? Dearer: dearer? Bhuvi on the earth.Commentary He who hands down this Gita to My devotees does immense service to Me. He is very dear to Me. Is there none in the present generation who is of dearer service to Me? nor shall there be in future also in this world.Bhuvi On earth in this world.
